title: How to Buy Robux

steps.headline: Go to https://www.roblox.com/upgrades/robux in a web browser.
steps.description: If you're not already signed in, click Log In at the top-right corner of the page to sign in now. If you don't have a credit or debit card, you can use cash at any store that sells Roblox or Rixty cards. See Roblox's card page (https://www.roblox.com/gamecards) to see where Roblox cards are available near you, or Rixty's location finder (https://www.rixty.com/wheretobuy) to find the nearest place to get a Rixty card.

steps.headline: Click the price next to the amount of Robux you want to buy.
steps.description: This brings you to a list of payment methods.

steps.headline: Select a payment method and click Continue.
Enter your payment details.
steps.description: If you chose to pay with a credit or debit card, enter the details from the card. If you're using a Roblox or Rixty card, enter the PIN from the card and click Redeem. If you selected PayPal, follow the on-screen instructions to sign into your PayPal account and complete your payment. If you're paying with a credit or debit card, you'll also have to enter your email address.

steps.headline: Click Pay now or Submit Order.
steps.description: It's the green button below your payment info. Once your payment is processed, your Robux will be added to your account in the game.

steps.headline: Open Roblox on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.
steps.description: It's the icon with two Roblox characters that says "ROBLOX" inside. You'll usually find it on the home screen or in the app drawer.

steps.headline: Tap the R$ icon.
steps.description: It's near the top-right corner. Your current balance appears at the top.

steps.headline: Tap the amount of Robux you want to buy.
steps.description: The price for each package appears next to the amount of Robux you're buying. The pop-up will appear, asking you to confirm your purchase. If you want to cancel the purchase, tap Cancel (iPhone/iPad) or the back button (Android).

steps.headline: Follow the on-screen instructions to pay for your Robux.
steps.description: If you're using an Android, you'll be billed by your Google Play account. If you're using an iPhone or iPad, you will be billed by the App Store. Once you confirm, your Robux will be added to your balance.

If you're paying with a credit or debit card, you'll also have to enter your email address. Click Pay now or Submit Order. It's the green button below your payment info.
